#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int main(){	
	int m,n;
	cin>>m>>n;
	int v[2001],value[2001],dp[10001]={0};
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		cin>>v[i]>>value[i];
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
    for(int j = m; j >= v[i]; j--){
		if(v[i]<=m)
			dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[j-v[i]] + value[i]);}}
	cout<<dp[m]<<endl;
	return 0;
}
